# R Packages

## Keep track of installed packages, and re-install after the upgrade

Before the upgrade:
```{r eval=FALSE}
setwd("C:/Temp/")
packages <- installed.packages()[,"Package"]
save(packages, file="Rpackages")
```

After the upgrade:
```{r eval=FALSE}
setwd("C:/Temp/")
load("Rpackages")
for (p in setdiff(packages, installed.packages()[,"Package"]))
install.packages(p)
```
